Description:
Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - SharpView Execution
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" original_file_name="SharpView.exe" process_path="*\\SharpView.exe" (command="*Add-RemoteConnection*" OR command="*Convert-ADName*" OR command="*ConvertFrom-SID*" OR command="*ConvertFrom-UACValue*" OR command="*Convert-SidToName*" OR command="*Export-PowerViewCSV*" OR command="*Find-DomainObjectPropertyOutlier*" OR command="*Find-DomainProcess*" OR command="*Find-DomainShare*" OR command="*Find-DomainUserEvent*" OR command="*Find-DomainUserLocation*" OR command="*Find-ForeignGroup*" OR command="*Find-ForeignUser*" OR command="*Find-GPOComputerAdmin*" OR command="*Find-GPOLocation*" OR command="*Find-Interesting*" OR command="*Find-LocalAdminAccess*" OR command="*Find-ManagedSecurityGroups*" OR command="*Get-CachedRDPConnection*" OR command="*Get-DFSshare*" OR command="*Get-DomainComputer*" OR command="*Get-DomainController*" OR command="*Get-DomainDFSShare*" OR command="*Get-DomainDNSRecord*" OR command="*Get-DomainFileServer*" OR command="*Get-DomainForeign*" OR command="*Get-DomainGPO*" OR command="*Get-DomainGroup*" OR command="*Get-DomainGUIDMap*" OR command="*Get-DomainManagedSecurityGroup*" OR command="*Get-DomainObject*" OR command="*Get-DomainOU*" OR command="*Get-DomainPolicy*" OR command="*Get-DomainSID*" OR command="*Get-DomainSite*" OR command="*Get-DomainSPNTicket*" OR command="*Get-DomainSubnet*" OR command="*Get-DomainTrust*" OR command="*Get-DomainUserEvent*" OR command="*Get-ForestDomain*" OR command="*Get-ForestGlobalCatalog*" OR command="*Get-ForestTrust*" OR command="*Get-GptTmpl*" OR command="*Get-GroupsXML*" OR command="*Get-LastLoggedOn*" OR command="*Get-LoggedOnLocal*" OR command="*Get-NetComputer*" OR command="*Get-NetDomain*" OR command="*Get-NetFileServer*" OR command="*Get-NetForest*" OR command="*Get-NetGPO*" OR command="*Get-NetGroupMember*" OR command="*Get-NetLocalGroup*" OR command="*Get-NetLoggedon*" OR command="*Get-NetOU*" OR command="*Get-NetProcess*" OR command="*Get-NetRDPSession*" OR command="*Get-NetSession*" OR command="*Get-NetShare*" OR command="*Get-NetSite*" OR command="*Get-NetSubnet*" OR command="*Get-NetUser*" OR command="*Get-PathAcl*" OR command="*Get-PrincipalContext*" OR command="*Get-RegistryMountedDrive*" OR command="*Get-RegLoggedOn*" OR command="*Get-WMIRegCachedRDPConnection*" OR command="*Get-WMIRegLastLoggedOn*" OR command="*Get-WMIRegMountedDrive*" OR command="*Get-WMIRegProxy*" OR command="*Invoke-ACLScanner*" OR command="*Invoke-CheckLocalAdminAccess*" OR command="*Invoke-Kerberoast*" OR command="*Invoke-MapDomainTrust*" OR command="*Invoke-RevertToSelf*" OR command="*Invoke-Sharefinder*" OR command="*Invoke-UserImpersonation*" OR command="*Remove-DomainObjectAcl*" OR command="*Remove-RemoteConnection*" OR command="*Request-SPNTicket*" OR command="*Set-DomainObject*" OR command="*Test-AdminAccess*")
